## Quick Install

<CodeGroup>
```bash pip (recommended)
pip install -U markitecture
```

```bash pipx
pipx install markitecture
```

```bash uv
uv pip install markitecture
```
</CodeGroup>

## Core Features

<AccordionGroup>
  <Accordion title="Intelligent Text Splitting" icon="scissors" defaultOpen>
    Split large markdown files into smaller, manageable sections based on headings or custom rules.

    ```bash
    markitect --split.i README.md --split.settings.o docs/
    ```
  </Accordion>

  <Accordion title="Link Management" icon="link">
    Handle links intelligently through:
    - Automatic link validation
    - Reference-style link conversion
    - Broken link detection

    ```bash
    markitect --check-links.i docs/guide.md
    ```
  </Accordion>

  <Accordion title="Static Site Generation" icon="browser">
    Generate static documentation sites automatically:
    - Support for MkDocs
    - Theme customization
    - Navigation structure
    - Asset management

    ```bash
    markitect --mkdocs.dir docs/ --mkdocs.site-name "My Docs"
    ```
  </Accordion>
</AccordionGroup>
